alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lafayette; Marshall; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 10:47AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lafayette, northwestern Union, eastern Marshall, Tippah, Benton, Fayette, Hardeman, southeastern Haywood and southwestern Madison Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1047 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Dancyville to near Slayden to near Cambridge. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Bolivar, Ripley, Wall Doxey State Park, Lamar, Whiteville, Somerville, Blue Mountain, Snow Lake Shores, Hillville, Bethlehem, Canaan, Pocahontas, Lagrange, Dancyville, Cloverport, Slayden, Mercer, Michigan City and Gravestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
